classmethod init_analyzers(config: StateAnalyzerFactoryConfig) → None[source]

Initializes state analyzers for the given configuration by importing corresponding modules, objects and creating instances.

Parameters:

config – configuration for state analyzers.

classmethod get_analyzer(analyzer_name: str) → StateAnalyzer[source]

Gets state analyzer with the given name.

Parameters:

analyzer_name – name of a state analyzer.

Returns:

state analyzer.

Raises:

ItemNotFoundError – if no analyzer with the given name is found.
